(initial US release)

Casablanca is a 1942 American romantic drama film directit bi Michael Curtiz an based on Murray Burnett an Joan Alison's un-produced stage play Everybody Comes to Rick's. The film starns Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, an Paul Henreid; an features Claude Rains, Conrad Veidt, Sydney Greenstreet, Peter Lorre, an Dooley Wilson. Set durin Warld War II, it focuses on a man torn atween, in the wirds o ane character, "love an virtue". He must chuise atween his luve for a wumman an helpin her Czech Resistance leader guidman escape the Vichy-controlled Moroccan ceety o Casablanca tae continue his fecht against the Nazis.
